channel.title: Rune-Lyfe Development team making
channel.description:
Hi all, [font=impact][size=36pt]Rune-Lyfe[/size][/font] owner here![left][font=impact]I am the proud owner of it and I would like to share that server with all of you :) ! [/font][b] [i][u]1st:[/u][/i][/b] The website is * [b][i][u]2nd:[/u][/i][/b] Need a website coder for phps (for login.php only) Message me. [url=http://]Derek1.2@hotmail.com[/url] [b][i][u]3rd:[/u][/i][/b] Need help to make a webclient: Message me with the same email :) [/left] If you want to be in the development team do a apply with this format; ______________________________________________ | Your name: | | Your age: | | Your email: | | What can you do with Rsps: | | What you can do with PHP/websites: | | Why you want to be in the development team: | | Additional information here: | |____________________________________________|
Thanks - [size=1em]Runite[/size]

item.title: Rune-Lyfe Development team making
item.dc:creator: @Tea_Cup Tea Cup
item.description:
@Tea_Cup wrote:

Your name: Greg (Tea Cup)

Your age: 16

Your email: teacupcoder@live.com

What can you do with Rsps: anything that you need done

What you can do with PHP/websites: nothing

Why you want to be in the development team: im looking to help servers an be a part of a community an make the game as fun as possible for staff an players, also to make sure everything is in order an everyone is treated equally

Additional information here: here is more info about me an what im about.
Link:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464487.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Lyfe Development team making
item.dc:creator: @neevbc neevbc
item.description:
@neevbc wrote:

[ul][li]Your name: Neev
Your age: 17
Your email: NeevRSPS@hotmail.co.uk
What can you do with Rsps: I can Code, I can be in game for many hours, I can creat forum to the server and many things that we could chat about…
What you can do with PHP/websites: I can make Forums for the server , although i saw you got a very good home page and all, so for that matter we could just upgrade it more and more!
Why you want to be in the development team: I like making websites,creating RSPS’s, And generally helping people!
Additional information here: Most of the time on i am (many many hours! and i work hard )!
hoping to hear from you [/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Read full topic

Hi all, [font=impact][size=36pt]Rune-Lyfe[/size][/font] owner here![left][font=impact]I am the proud owner of it and I would like to share that server with all of you ! [/font]

2nd: Need a website coder for phps (for login.php only) Message me. Derek1.2@hotmail.com
3rd: Need help to make a webclient: Message me with the same email [/left]
